parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Row number of the desired cell; this is a 0-based index

parameters.name: Col
parameters.description: Column number of the desired cell; this is a 0-based index

title: IBomTable.GetEntryText
description: Retrieves the contents of the specified cell as a string regardless of the cell's data type.
signature:
System.String GetEntryText( 
   System.Int32
Row
,
   System.Int32
Col
)

parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Row number of the desired cell; this is a 0-based index

parameters.name: Col
parameters.description: Column number of the desired cell; this is a 0-based index

returns: Text string from the specified cell
remarks:
Use
IBomTable::GetEntryValue
for typed return values.
Before you use any of the IBomTable methods, activate the BOM table using
IBomTable::Attach3
. After you finish getting BOM data, use
IBomTable::Detach
to deactivate the table.
